Title: Meteor Madness
Credits: Created by Daniel Do (daado@ucsc.edu) with code from Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu).

Home.Body: You happen to notice a meteor crash in the Donut Plains. By helping an Agent with the meteor, you both end up learning about the meteors that are falling all over the Leinad Province.

Choices.Text: Look into the rumors of strange weather near the inn
Choices.Target: Look into the rumors of strange weather near the inn

Look into the rumors of strange weather.Body: What's that noise...? It's coming from the west. What was that? It seems to have landed nearby, maybe you should go check it out.

Check it out.Body: Agent: "Hey you! Human. What are you doing here? You're not supposed to be here! Seeing as you are new to the land, I can't see you being prosecuted. This meteor is different to what we've seen before. We suspect that direct contact with the meteor is dangerous. The magical radiation doesn't seem to be affecting you at all though. Do you not feel anything? Perhaps you could help me locate it."

Choices.Text: Explore the cave that the meteor crashed into
Choices.Target: Explore the cave that the meteor crashed into

Explore the cave that the meteor crashed.Body: It seems like the meteor crashed into a cave. Inside the cave, there's two paths to continue on.

Left path.Body: You reach an intersection where you can see a meteor shard along the path the meteor crashed down through.

Investigation.Text: Look closer at the meteor shard
Investigation.Target: Look closer at the meteor shard

Right path.Body: As you walk deeper into the cave, you approach a dead end containing a rusty shovel. Looks like someone was here before...

Pick up the rusty shovel.Body: Maybe this will come in handy later.

Look closer at the meteor shard.Body: The meteor shard is radiating an odd and unfamiliar magical energy.

Continue on the path.Body: An explosion occurs, blocking off the meteor's path and forces you stuck into a dead end.

Pull out the rusty shovel.Body: As you shovel your way out, an ominous voice is heard from a distance...

Investigation.Text: Follow the voice through the weird trail
Investigation.Target: Follow the voice through the weird trail

>.Body: Thief: "What is... this feeling… No I won't listen.."

>>.Body: Thief: "I can't... control... my mind... e̴n̴d̴ ̷m̶e̷.̷"

>>>.Body: It seems that a meteor shard has made the thief go crazy! The thief is quickly and aggresively coming to attack you!

Swing the rusty shovel.Body: Nicely done! The thief was stopped. Looks like the meteor shard stolen has been dropped.

Choices.Text: Grab the stolen meteor shard and escape the cave
Choices.Target: Grab the stolen meteor shard and escape the cave

Grab the stolen meteor shard and escape.Body: Agent: "Hello again. Did you find the meteor down there? Why on earth are you holding some?!"

Continue talking.Body: Agent: "I see. This material is incredibly rare and magically powerful. Meteors fall all over Leinad and come in a variety of colors and potency."

Continue talking....Body: Agent: "We don't fully understand them, but we know they are dangerous. Every scientist who has studied them has lost their minds."

Continue talking to the Agent.Body: Agent: "The meteors hold many secrets and powers, maybe the ones we need to end all of the madness we've seen. Thank you, here's a small reward for helping us."

Reward.Body: Just a singular coin, but it's more than a coin... it's a coin with story behind it; a story of how a piece of the cosmos made someone so obsessed that it made them go mad out of this world.

Escape the cave.Body: The Agent from before seems to have been attacked by an unknown being. You get the feeling that this incident could have been avoided. You are burdened with tremendous guilt, there is no returning home for you.

....Body: You are stuck, unable to breath as the oxygen in the cave quickly depletes. You try to claw your way out, but it is too late. You realize that you have been caved in, and there is no way out.
